faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Find answers to common questions about our platform and trading process

createTradeAd.question: How do I create a trade ad?
createTradeAd.answer: To create a trade ad, navigate to the Trading page and click on the 'Create Ad' button. Select the items you want to offer and the items you're looking for, then publish your ad.

middleman.question: What is a middleman?
middleman.answer: A middleman is a trusted third party who helps facilitate trades to ensure both parties receive what was agreed upon. They hold items from both traders until both sides of the trade are verified.

itemValue.question: How is an item's value calculated?
itemValue.answer: Item values are calculated using a combination of trading data, demand tracking, and expert analysis from our team. Values are updated regularly to reflect the current market.

vouches.question: Can free vouches be taken?
vouches.answer: Vouches should only be given after a successful trade to maintain the integrity of our reputation system. Free vouches can be removed by moderators if discovered.

howItWorks.title: How Our Middleman Service Works
howItWorks.subtitle: Simple, secure, and transparent trading process

step1.title: Choose a Middleman
step1.description: Browse our list of verified middlemen and select one based on their ratings, commission rates, and availability.

step2.title: Initiate the Trade
step2.description: Contact your chosen middleman and provide details about your trade. They'll guide you through the secure process.

step3.title: Secure Exchange
step3.description: Both parties send their items to the middleman, who verifies everything before completing the exchange.

step4.title: Trade Complete
step4.description: Once verified, the middleman distributes the items to both parties. Your trade is now complete and secure!

whyChoose.title: Why Choose Our Middleman Service?
whyChoose.subtitle: The most trusted and secure way to trade valuable items

security.title: 100% Secure
